OOC: The effects of the gas will eventually wear off on their own.

Flicker::

Looking for any means of escape, the spy flies through the same 
breach Battera used to bring Kup outside, still carrying Nightlight 
over his shoulder.  Firing behind him to disrupt any pursuit, he 
zooms off toward the Predacon base.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord:
> 
> Windlord saw the conmotion down then he landed and saw his friend 
> Kup pretty bad "Kup, KUP... WHAT'S UP WHAT'S GOING ON????" and 
> looking to Battera said "Who're you? what's your faction? and 
> whatdid happen him???"
>
